title.narrative: Job Booster SEC Burkina Faso 2020-2023 (project year 2021)

description.narrative:
Boosting decent (self-)employment in insecure-prone Burkina Faso 2020 - 2023.
This regards the implementation project for period 2021. The planned indicators below refer to 2021 only.
For information about realized indicators and other project years, we refer to the "related activity" (which is the parent project).

title.narrative: # of women's groups, farmers' organizations and other associations working with vulnerable people to employment opportunities (self-employment) and promising jobs in the SEC regions reached

description.narrative: # of women's groups, farmers' organizations and other associations working with vulnerable people to employment opportunities (self-employment) and promising jobs in the SEC regions reached

Compter le nombre de groupes de femmes, d’associations de producteurs et le nombre d'associations de personnes vulnérables sensibilisées sur les opportunités économiques des jeunes dans les communes. Le nombre de groupes ainsi que le nombre de membres de ces groupes ayant bénéficié des messages de sensibilisation développés par les OBC sur les opportunités économiques des jeunes.
